stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Abyssal Secret: The Missing Link of the Deep!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Alchemists of the Deep Sea Guild have uncovered a great mystery in the Abyssal Depths. They found small, shimmer-scaled dwellers connect the surface's bounty to the deep's mighty sea beasts. These magical fish rise at night to feed, completing the ocean's mystical chain of sustenance.

stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Wizards Confirm: Time Flees Faster on The Red Orb!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Celestial Wizards' Guild has confirmed a fascinating truth about The Red Orb. Due to the Grand Weave of Time, moments pass quicker there than in our Azure Realm. These subtle flicks of the sands could greatly aid future astrological charting and sending spells to the distant world.
